field.value: It doesn't matter lazy = true, lazy = false I still can not fetch related object. I had attached a simple test case so that you can do a quick check.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text:
I just attached a working version of your solution.
Reasons for failures in your tests: 1) Please stick to the documented mapping: Both sides of a one-to-one-relationship should use [OneToOne] and not [BelongsTo] and [OneToOne]. 2) Customer.CustomerAddress had not been set on the created object. The test used Customer.Find(id) which loads the object from 1st-level-cache where it is still unset (=null). You need to either 2a) call Refresh() on the loaded object. 2b) use different session scopes 2c) set Customer.CustomerAddress before saving, so that the object in the first-level-cache contains the relation as well.
